content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing a fair rental price. What do you think would be appropriate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. So, I negotiate with you. Can you give me the rental price you propose?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide a rental price without more information about the current market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. Can you provide me with some context on what you are expecting to pay for a similar apartment in the area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. So, I negotiate with you. Can you give me the rental price you propose?

I am expecting to pay around 800 Euro per month for a similar apartment in the area.

I am willing to negotiate to get the best possible deal.

I am dependable and responsible, so I am sure I will pay on time.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I understand your expectations and willingness to negotiate. Based on the current market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich, I am able to offer a rental price of 900 Euro per month. This price reflects the quality of the apartment and the location, while also taking into account the current market conditions. I appreciate your dependability and commitment to paying on time, and I am confident that we can establish a positive and mutually beneficial relationship. I am open to discussing any additional terms or conditions that may be of concern to you.
name: Heinrich Heine
